actions.name: Blanketing Firn
actions.description: Effect: When the user is active on the field, the Weather is changed to Intense Snowfall. This weather persists while the user with this Ability is active. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or switches out, the weather will change to Snowy for 5 rounds.
